sentences.en: "We must endeavour to forget all that has passed on either side, " said Jane. "I hope and trust they will yet be happy.
sentences.cn: 吉英说：“我们应该把他们两个人过去的事尽力忘掉，我希望他们还是会幸福，也相信这样。

sentences.en: A robot - arm from the Endeavour will grab the telescope.
sentences.cn: “奋进”号上的一只 机器手 将抓住望远镜并托住它.

sentences.en: an outstanding example of human endeavor
sentences.cn: 人类努力进取的突出例证

sentences.en: But I will endeavour to banish every painful thought, and think only of what will make me happy: your affection, and the invariable kindness of my dear uncle and aunt.
sentences.cn: 可是我一定会竭力打消一切苦痛的念头，只去想一些能使我高兴的事───譬如想想你的亲切以及亲爱的舅父母对我始终如一的关切。

sentences.en: Despite our best endeavours, we couldn’t start the car.
sentences.cn: 我们虽然尽了最大努力，但还是无法发动汽车。

sentences.en: For this reason, I oftensuffer and endeavour to reexamine myself.
sentences.cn: 我因此也时时煞了苦痛, 努力的要想到我自己.

sentences.en: He may endeavour to deserve her.
sentences.cn: 他可以努力使自己无愧于她.

sentences.en: I will endeavour to arrange it.
sentences.cn: 我会尽力安排。

sentences.en: It is often an ungainly, comic endeavour.
sentences.cn: 那往往是一种笨拙可笑的尝试.

sentences.en: Making officials more honest is portrayed as vital to this endeavour.
sentences.cn: 使官员诚信被说成是这个努力的关键.

sentences.en: Mrs Palin, the early wisdom went, would help in the endeavour.
sentences.cn: 虽然佩林女士失去了竞选早期的智慧, 但她对此也许还会有些作用.

sentences.en: On account of your health, you must endeavour to shift off the care of your children.
sentences.cn: 由于你的身体状况, 你必须设法卸掉照看孩子这一负担.

sentences.en: Please make every endeavour to arrive on time.
sentences.cn: 请尽全力按时到达。

sentences.en: She told him she would endeavour to procure it for him.
sentences.cn: 她对他说她将努力去替他找回.

sentences.en: The same applies to every other field of endeavour.
sentences.cn: 各方面都要解决这个问题.

sentences.en: The settlement of the wilderness was a worthy endeavour. Honour is important , and courage and justice.
sentences.cn: 开辟荒原是极有价值之伟业, 荣耀、勇武、正义乃为头等重要.

sentences.en: The shuttle Endeavour will be taking the astronauts to the Hubble.
sentences.cn: “奋进”号航天飞机将把宇航员送上哈勃.

sentences.en: They are endeavouring to protect trade union rights.
sentences.cn: 他们正在努力保护工会权利。

sentences.en: They made every endeavour to find the two boys.
sentences.cn: 中文例句: 他们竭尽全力寻找那两个男孩。

sentences.en: We must always endeavour to improve our work.
sentences.cn: 我们总要努力改进自己的工作.

sentences.en: We will endeavour to bring you more news as it becomes available.
sentences.cn: 我们将尽快带来更多的进一步的消息.

trans.tran_en: an attempt to do something new or difficult

trans.tran_cn: 努力， 尽力； 尝试
